name: part_002
file: tmp_【#常闇トワ生誕祭2021】ゲストもいっぱい！楽しんじゃお！✨【3DLIVE】 [NuOJhtBC7R4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Tokoyami Towa performs a cover of 'unravel'.
Towa's MC section where she announces the start of the guest collaboration part of the live.
Shirakami Fubuki, Ookami Mio, and Tokoyami Towa perform 'Suspect'.

subtitles.original: 壊れた僕なんてさ
subtitles.english: A broken me...

subtitles.original: 息を止めて
subtitles.english: Stop breathing

subtitles.original: ほどけない もうほどけないよ
subtitles.english: Can't unravel, can't unravel anymore

subtitles.original: 真実さえ
subtitles.english: Even the truth

subtitles.original: 壊せる 壊せない 狂える 狂えない あなたを見つけて
subtitles.english: Can break, can't break, can go mad, can't go mad, I found you

subtitles.original: 揺れた歪んだ世界にだんだん僕は
subtitles.english: In a shaking, distorted world, I'm gradually...

subtitles.original: 透き通って見えなくなって
subtitles.english: Becoming transparent and invisible

subtitles.original: 見つけないで 僕のことを
subtitles.english: Don't find me

subtitles.original: 見つめないで
subtitles.english: Don't stare at me

subtitles.original: 誰かが描いた世界の中で
subtitles.english: In a world someone else drew

subtitles.original: あなたを傷つけたくはないよ
subtitles.english: I don't want to hurt you

subtitles.original: 覚えていて 僕のことを
subtitles.english: Remember me

subtitles.original: 無限に広がる孤独が絡まる
subtitles.english: Infinite loneliness gets entangled

subtitles.original: 無邪気に笑った記憶が刺さって
subtitles.english: Memories of laughing innocently pierce through

subtitles.original: 動けない 動けない 動けない 動けない 動けない 動けないよ
subtitles.english: Can't move, can't move, can't move, can't move, can't move, can't move...

subtitles.original: Unravel Ghoul!
subtitles.english: Unravel Ghoul!

subtitles.original: 変わってしまった 変えられなかった
subtitles.english: Changed, couldn't be changed

subtitles.original: 2つが絡まる 2人が滅びる
subtitles.english: Two get entangled, two perish

subtitles.original: 壊せる 壊せない 狂える 狂えない あなたを汚せないよ
subtitles.english: Can break, can't break, can go mad, can't go mad, I can't defile you

subtitles.original: 揺れた歪んだ世界にだんだん僕は
subtitles.english: In a shaking, distorted world, I'm gradually...

subtitles.original: 透き通って見えなくなって
subtitles.english: Becoming transparent and invisible

subtitles.original: 見つけないで 僕のことを
subtitles.english: Don't find me

subtitles.original: 見つめないで
subtitles.english: Don't stare at me

subtitles.original: 誰かが仕組んだ孤独な罠に 未来がほどけてしまう前に
subtitles.english: Before the future unravels in a lonely trap someone set up

subtitles.original: 思い出して 僕のことを
subtitles.english: Remember me

subtitles.original: 鮮やかなまま
subtitles.english: Just as vivid as ever

subtitles.original: 忘れないで 忘れないで 忘れないで 忘れないで
subtitles.english: Don't forget me, don't forget me, don't forget me, don't forget me

subtitles.original: 変わってしまったことにParalyze
subtitles.english: Paralyze by the fact that it has changed

subtitles.original: 変えられないことだらけのParadise
subtitles.english: Paradise full of things that can't be changed

subtitles.original: 覚えていて 僕のことを
subtitles.english: Remember me

subtitles.original: 教えて 教えて
subtitles.english: Tell me, tell me

subtitles.original: 僕の中に 誰がいるの？
subtitles.english: Who is inside of me?

subtitles.original: そしたら、ここからはコラボだ〜い！
subtitles.english: Then, from here, it's a collaboration!

subtitles.original: いたずらに君を ずっと見ていたわけじゃない
subtitles.english: I wasn't just watching you mischievously all the time

subtitles.original: 僕の考えを 当ててごらんよ
subtitles.english: Try to guess my thoughts

subtitles.original: 些細なしぐさ 千も瞬き 君は手のひらに
subtitles.english: Subtle gestures, a thousand blinks, you are in the palm of my hand

subtitles.original: 気のないふりしたって 罠にかかるわけないわ
subtitles.english: If you were indifferent, there's no way you'd fall into a trap

subtitles.original: 甘い言葉にも 惑わされない
subtitles.english: I won't be misled by sweet words

subtitles.original: 心の奥の奥の奥まで 見透かしちゃうよ
subtitles.english: I'll see through to the very depths of your heart

subtitles.original: Looking, seeking, touching, feeling... Why you know?
subtitles.english: Looking, seeking, touching, feeling... Why do you know?

subtitles.original: Looking, seeking, touching, feeling... I know it.
subtitles.english: Looking, seeking, touching, feeling... I know it.

subtitles.original: Looking, seeking, touching, feeling... Understand?
subtitles.english: Looking, seeking, touching, feeling... Understand?

subtitles.original: Meaning, meaning... Oh, Are you ready?
subtitles.english: Meaning, meaning... Oh, Are you ready?

subtitles.original: 自覚なき 意思表示を 思い通りに 君を動かして
subtitles.english: With an unconscious expression of will, I'll move you just as I want
